name: Domination - War of Nations
description:
Domination: War of Nations is a turn-based online board game. Each player will be given a different objective during the world war. players will need to execute good strategies to conquer territories and continents.
It will be possible to receive exchange cards per turn to gain advantages during the confrontation. Currently cards can benefit from soldiers, war tanks and missiles. In this strategy game, it will be important to use your army variations wisely.
In the end, only the player who manages to execute the best strategy to conquer his main objective will win.
